name: cat cafe (goblincat)
description:
🐈 Cat cafe is an idle game about running a cat cafe

🐈 No input needed, just watch your cats come and go.  You can choose to name, play with, and feed your cats which will make them more likely to be rehomed. Each week is 8 seconds long, and an event will happen each week.

i should stop deciding on the game dimensions before seeing how it looks like in build bc i def regret how tall this is. frankly, zooming out to about 67% is the best move for my computer so u may wanna experiment w that lol
